content: Home Agenda  Speakers  Register Now CONTENT START Three Predictive Analytics World Events in NYC:  Business, Financial, Healthcare Pre-Conference Pricing Ends October 27 Predictive Analytics World , the leading cross-vendor event for  data science  and  machine learning  professionals, managers, and commercial practitioners is heading to  New York City  on  October 29 - November 2  with three co-located predictive analytics events:  Predictive Analytics World for Business Predictive Analytics World for Financial Services Predictive Analytics World for Healthcare Don't miss sessions and discussions driven by industry luminaries and thought-leaders, such as:  Jeff Deal, Vice President of Operations,  Elder Research Inc.  (PAW Healthcare) John Elder, Founder & Chair,  Elder Research, Inc.  (PAW Business, Financial, Healthcare) James Gottshall, Vice President, Strategic Analytics,  XL Catlin  (PAW Financial)  Jack Levis, Senior Director, Process Management,  UPS  (PAW Business) Julia Minkowski, Risk Analytics Manager,  Signifyd (formerly Fiserv)  (PAW Financial) Dr. Pamela Peele, Chief Analytics Officer,  UPMC Health Plan & UMPC Enterprises  (PAW Healthcare)  Claudia Perlich, Chief Scientist,  Dstillery  (PAW Business) Steven Ramirez, CEO,  Beyond The Arc  (PAW Financial) Anne Robinson, Executive Dir., Strategy, Analytics and Systems,  Verizon  (PAW Business) Dr. George Savage, Co-Founder & Chief Medical Officer,  Proteus Digital Health  (PAW Healthcare)  Seth Stephens-Davidowitz, Author,  Everybody Lies;  Opinion writer,  NYTimes ; Former data scientist,  Google  (PAW Business) Dr. Ken Yale, JD, DDS, Senior Vice President & Chief Clinical Officer,  Delta Dental of California  (PAW Healthcare) And more! Check out the full agenda for each of the co-located events here:  PAW Business Agenda PAW Financial Agenda PAW Healthcare Agenda "Hands down, best applied analytics conference I have ever attended."                                                                         - Jon Francis, Senior Statistician, T-Mobile "...the event met the highest expectations and provided a rewarding experience for all participants."                                                                            - Marianna Dizik, Statistician, Google Inc. "Cutting costs using predictive analytics is not science fiction; PAW showed us the path - top companies demonstrated reality."                                                   - Santhosh Kumar Shanmugam, Sr. Statistician, Expedia "The advantage of Predictive Analytics World to other conferences is that it's sponsor-neutral, thereby most of the effort goes into the promotion of various data mining techniques and not to a specific software."                                                   - Mehran Azhar, Senior Marketing Analyst, WW Grainger  Now is your last chance to save big to: See first-hand experiences Hear from experts Taste the future Smell career advancement Feel the excitement   ALL SPONSORS START Diamond Sponsors Silver Sponsors Sponsor Media Partners Association Partner NEWSLETTER IMPRINT START Conference produced by: Rising Media & Prediction Impact Privacy Policy

KDnuggets Home » News » 2017 » Oct » Meetings » Three Predictive Analytics Events in NYC – Business, Financial, Healthcare, Oct 29 – Nov 2 ( 17:n39 )

Three Predictive Analytics Events in NYC – Business, Financial, Healthcare, Oct 29 – Nov 2

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Business, Fintech, Healthcare, New York City, NY, PAW, Predictive Analytics World

Predictive Analytics World, the leading cross-vendor event for data science and machine learning professionals will be at NYC, Oct 29-Nov 2. Pre-conference rates end Oct 27.


Home
Agenda
Speakers
Register Now

Three Predictive Analytics World Events in NYC: 
Business, Financial, Healthcare
Pre-Conference Pricing Ends October 27


Predictive Analytics World, the leading cross-vendor event for data science and machine learning professionals, managers, and commercial practitioners is heading to New York City on October 29 - November 2 with three co-located predictive analytics events: 

  • Predictive Analytics World for Business
  • Predictive Analytics World for Financial Services
  • Predictive Analytics World for Healthcare


Don't miss sessions and discussions driven by industry luminaries and thought-leaders, such as: 


  • Jeff Deal, Vice President of Operations, Elder Research Inc. (PAW Healthcare)
  • John Elder, Founder & Chair, Elder Research, Inc. (PAW Business, Financial, Healthcare)
  • James Gottshall, Vice President, Strategic Analytics, XL Catlin (PAW Financial) 
  • Jack Levis, Senior Director, Process Management, UPS (PAW Business)
  • Julia Minkowski, Risk Analytics Manager, Signifyd (formerly Fiserv) (PAW Financial)
  • Dr. Pamela Peele, Chief Analytics Officer, UPMC Health Plan & UMPC Enterprises (PAW Healthcare) 
  • Claudia Perlich, Chief Scientist, Dstillery (PAW Business)
  • Steven Ramirez, CEO, Beyond The Arc (PAW Financial)
  • Anne Robinson, Executive Dir., Strategy, Analytics and Systems, Verizon (PAW Business)
  • Dr. George Savage, Co-Founder & Chief Medical Officer, Proteus Digital Health (PAW Healthcare) 
  • Seth Stephens-Davidowitz, Author, Everybody Lies; Opinion writer, NYTimes; Former data scientist, Google (PAW Business)
  • Dr. Ken Yale, JD, DDS, Senior Vice President & Chief Clinical Officer, Delta Dental of California (PAW Healthcare)
And more! Check out the full agenda for each of the co-located events here: 
  • PAW Business Agenda
  • PAW Financial Agenda
  • PAW Healthcare Agenda

"Hands down, best applied analytics conference I have ever attended."
                                                                       - Jon Francis, Senior Statistician, T-Mobile

"...the event met the highest expectations and provided a rewarding experience for all participants."
                                                                          - Marianna Dizik, Statistician, Google Inc.

"Cutting costs using predictive analytics is not science fiction; PAW showed us the path - top companies demonstrated reality."
                                                 - Santhosh Kumar Shanmugam, Sr. Statistician, Expedia

"The advantage of Predictive Analytics World to other conferences is that it's sponsor-neutral, thereby most of the effort goes into the promotion of various data mining techniques and not to a specific software."
                                                 - Mehran Azhar, Senior Marketing Analyst, WW Grainger

 Now is your last chance to save big to:

  • See first-hand experiences
  • Hear from experts
  • Taste the future
  • Smell career advancement
  • Feel the excitement
